TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReplySessionChannel implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel, class System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel`1<class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession>, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject

Docs.summary: Define a interface para associar um canal de resposta uma sessão

remarks.format:
## Remarks O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> interface indica que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplyChannel> implementa <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> semântica.
O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IInputSession> associado com seu <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IReplySessionChannel> podem ser recuperados por meio de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ISessionChannel%601.Session%2A> propriedade.
